alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 07 at 1:47PM PST until January 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM PST MONDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds around 15 mph. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 degrees will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 degrees are possible. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 7 PM PST this evening. For the Frost Advisory, from 1 AM to 10 AM PST Monday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Monday night through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches
